name: Kimero!! Hero Gakuen: Eiyuu ni Kotae Nashi
overview: Kimero Hero Gakuen Eiyuu ni Shinjutsu Nashi is an adventure simulation game in which the player is on charge of a hero academy where he got to train 5 hero candidates (2 girls and 3 boys) and to do that he can choose different weekly trainings for each of them. There will be some times in the game where he can also talk to one of the characters and try to make him effort more in his training or give him different advices. The motivation of the character will change depending of the choices in those conversations.
